data.meta_description: Learn about Adam Kaufman on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Adam Kaufman, such as Kanalua, The Girl Next Door and more.
data.text:
Kanalua

McGarrett asks Catherine to help find his mother; the teams seek assistance from August March (Edward Asner) with a deadly art heist.

The Girl Next Door

Veronica becomes suspicious when her pregnant upstairs neighbor suddenly goes missing, prompting both Keith and Veronica to investigate the girl's disappearance. Veronica is also shocked to learn that her mother and Duncan's father were high school sweethearts. Meanwhile, it appears that Weevil and the late Lilly Kane once had a romantic relationship.

Past Imperfect

The death of a former cover girl leads detectives to unearth secrets the woman was desperately trying to hide.

Fear, Itself

A Halloween party at a campus frat house takes a frightening turn with the sudden appearance of blood-sucking bats, zombies, and a demon that plays on everyoneâs innermost fears.
